A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought about calling this movie a dumpster fire\, but then I saw an actual dumpster fire and realized that it was more entertaining than this plotless\, agenda driven money grab.\n\nAlso\, what's up with the audience score apparently being frozen?  I obviously didn't look at 178\,000 fan reviews individually\, but a quick scan of the most recent couple hundred or so makes me think that 49% is optimistic at best and mathematically implausable at worst.
